pull_request.title: docs: add Table API Decisions
pull_request.body:
### ⚠️ Ready for Early Feedback
- We need early feedback on which API makes more sense (Compact vs Composable) from a consumer point of view
- Do you see some use-case in our products that cannot be fulfilled with the proposed API
- Some of the prop names and minor API structures could change once we finalise the approach (Compact vs Composable)

### [View Formatted File](https://github.com/razorpay/blade/blob/e1da3e035e7ff7f4ca1183f01cf9e2b3be13fb8b/packages/blade/src/components/Table/_decisions/decisions.md)

issue.title: Popover Component Bug in "banking theme, dark color scheme"
issue.body: In the popover component: There is an extra div (which contains the close button) with white background getting added on top of the close button in the blade pop over component. Even though the top level blade provider mentions a banking theme and dark color scheme. I tried to recreate the same in the blade documentation page but there it's all the same style but no white background. In dark mode: In blade documentation:
